post:
As we recently introduced KVM, we have doubled the memory on all our KVM plans! As usual you can run any OS you want (we'll provide an FTP server so you can upload your ISO). Also we provide a 7-day money back guarantee if you are not satisfied with the VPS, for any reason.

**Mini - 256 MB €4 ($5)**
256 MB guaranteed RAM
5 GB disk space
100 GB traffic
1 CPU at 3.3 Ghz
1 IPv4 address
25 IPv6 addresses
Order link: https://evixo.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=18


**Small - €5.50 ($7)**
512 MB guaranteed RAM
10 GB disk space
200 GB traffic
1 CPU at 3.3 Ghz
1 IPv4 address
25 IPv6 addresses
Order link: https://evixo.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=19&promocode=LET


All common operating systems are supported (even Windows - but no license is included). Additional IPv6 is possible, just shoot in a ticket.

**Datacenter and test IP**
The nodes are located in the Equinix datacenter, Dusseldorf (Germany).

Test IP: 80.83.117.247
